adviseScripts.text: If you only had 50MB left on your computer,
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: what would you do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I'm... asking for a friend.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I'd go buy a new hard drive.
I'd use what little space was left to install a game with a smaller file size.
You what?
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Why would you have to buy a new hard drive?
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: 50MB is still plenty of space for a lot of things! Like BOOM, for one.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Hehe, that's a perfect answer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: And of course, BOOM fits the bill perfectly, since it's just 28MB.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: In fact, I feel like installing it on something right now...
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Elegg and I discuss the various ways to use up remaining computer memory.
*Buzz*
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: *Buzzzzz*
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: *Zap*
*Kaboom*
Excellent,
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: the electrical current is flowing smoothly.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Huh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Why did it explode? I'm pretty sure I sent the correct voltage.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: These wires must be defective.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Elegg and I spend time together playing with electricity.
Mr. Commander,
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: what do you think of Trony?
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: She's great. Competent and cool.
Very taciturn.
You're pretty good at reading people,
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Mr. Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Without Trony, our squad wouldn't be able to function.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Well...
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: While that may be true,
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: she excels in plenty of other areas.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Elegg and I talk about Trony.
Let me give you a hypothetical:
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Say there are some guys who are giving you a hard time,
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: but it turns out they've been financially supporting your family, who is hard up.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Meanwhile, your parents have known about this the whole time and just never told you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: How would you feel?
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I'd do what I have to to survive; I'd keep accepting the money.
If living meant having to accept dirty money, I'd rather die.
I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Yes, for some people, survival takes precedence above all else,
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: but for me, how you live is even more important.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: ... I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I feel the same way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Some people may feel survival takes precedence above all else,
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: but for me, how you live is even more important.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I have a serious conversation with Elegg.
We all know BOOM is humanity's single greatest achievement,
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: but what do you personally think is its best aspect?
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: It has awesome graphics, despite the game taking up so little space.
It's big fun in a small package.
You're halfway there.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Killer graphics are great and all.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: But!
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: The most important thing about a game is how fun it is.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Couldn't have said it better myself!
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Usually, games with smaller file sizes are by necessity rather simple, which can sometimes hamper the enjoyment.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: But not with BOOM.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: It's got it all!
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Elegg passionately tells me about her love for BOOM for a while.
Mr. Commander,
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: do you think that our squad's name was chosen a bit hastily?
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Electric Shock seems a bit underwhelming.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I think it sounds cool.
It doesn't really stand out from other squad names.
Oh, really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Well, as long as you think it sounds cool, I suppose that's all that matters, hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I'm happy if you're happy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I  know a whole bunch of other squad names,
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: and they all seem way cooler than ours.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Despite that, I still don't think I'd want to change it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I've already grown attached to it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Elegg and I talk more about squad names.
What a thrill it is to harness electricity!
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Directly controlling an energy source invisible to the naked eye, to make it bend to your command...
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I don't see the appeal.
So cool!
Not many people do. It can be a hard concept to grasp.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: But I do take pleasure in it, and it's how I make a living.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: If you love what do you, you'll never work a day in your life!
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Hehe, you're adorable, Mr. Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I realize that harnessing electricity may be a difficult concept to grasp, but once you take a closer look, it can be incredibly fun.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: If you ever want to learn more, I'd be more than happy to teach you, hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Elegg and I enjoy our session together.
Let's see, first turn this...
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Then crank that, and...
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Tah-dah! BOOM is officially installed on your shower mirror!
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Now I'll be able to amuse myself while showering.
How did you install that game on a mirror?
Exactly!
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: You can control it using the tap and shower head.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Have fun playing!
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Didn't you know?
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Your mirror is actually a high-tech display screen.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Haven't you ever looked in the upper corner? It shows the news and weather reports.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I end the session feeling excited about playing games in the shower.
I love winter.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Nothing beats a clear winter day.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Can you guess why?
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Because it's dry?
Because you like the cold?
Exactly!
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: And dry weather means a whole lotta static electricity.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: That tingling sensation feels amazing! Hehehe!
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Oh, I guess I never told you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I'm not a fan of the cold.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I'm more into dry weather because that's when static electricity builds up.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: That tingling sensation is pure ecstasy! Hehehe!
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I spend time with Elegg generating static electricity.
Let's play a word game!
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Give me four words that start with the letter "E".
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: ElecTronycs, electricity, electrolyte, electromagnetic.
Enemies, extraction point, encirclement, exterminate.
Hehe,
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I'm a big fan of all those words.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: You pass!
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: You seem to be rather obsessed with war, Mr. Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Those are some awfully intense words you came up with...
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Elegg and I spend time playing word games.
Ah, lightning bolts, those searing flashes of light streaking across the night sky!
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Have you ever seen one in real life, Mr. Commander?
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I have.
Can't say I have.
Not entirely surprising, considering how often you go up to the surface.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text:
Lightning is an immense energy resource, 
but it's still beyond human control.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Someday, I want to hold lightning in my own two hands.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: You haven't?
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I thought with how often you go up to the surface, you'd have seen some at some point.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Well, I can tell you that it's a spectacular sight! First the flash, then the resounding BOOM!
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: One day I want to be able to harness the power of lightning.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Elegg and I spend time talking about lightning.
Hmm? It looks like your watch is broken.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: If you give it to me, I'll fix it for you in a jiffy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: You're not going to try and install BOOM on it, are you?
Thanks.
Huh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Of course not. There'd be no point.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I already installed it on your watch a long time ago.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: All right, give me a minute.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: All done!
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I check out my newly repaired watch that Elegg fixed.
Apparently, when you're into someone, there's this tingling feeling in your body that feels like electricity coursing through you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Have you ever felt anything like that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I have.
No, I haven't.
Really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: How did it feel, exactly?
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Was it like an electrical surge rising from your toes and spreading to the rest of your body? Or like a massive burst that detonated inside your body all at once?
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I thought for sure you would have.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I'm sure it doesn't literally feel like getting shocked, but I am curious about what that feels like.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Elegg and I further discuss the tingling feeling that comes with love.
Mr. Commander, which game is the G.O.A.T: BOOM, or Final Quest?
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Give it to me straight.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: That's not even a question. It's BOOM.
Final Quest, 'till I die!
You're darn right!
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Most of these games today wouldn't even exist if it weren't for BOOM.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: There's no comparing the two.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I... I can respect your opinion.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I spend time discussing games with Elegg.
Mr. Commander,
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text:
what do you think about 
using glitches during speedruns?
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Like clipping through forbidden paths and the like.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I personally consider it cheating.
As long as players are having fun, that's what's important, isn't it?
Hmm, I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Personally, I don't see anything terribly wrong with it. It's just another way to enjoy the game.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Although I do understand why others wouldn't want to use them.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I'm glad you feel the same way as me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: For hardcore gamers, speedrunning is just another way to enjoy the game.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: While I can understand why some people would have a problem with it, I personally don't see anything wrong with it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Elegg and I enjoy our session together.
Energy drinks are remarkable beverages.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: However!
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Trony chugs them like there's no tomorrow. It can't be good for her health...
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Let's confiscate her stash.
We'll have to restrict her to a set amount per day.
I think that'd be a good idea.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: There's nothing wrong with one now and then, but Trony really is excessive.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: For the sake of her health, I'll keep the energy drinks under lock and key for a while.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Sure, but do you think she'll actually listen to us?
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: It might be better to just confiscate all the energy drinks she has on hand.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I'm sure she'll come to understand that we're doing it for her own good.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I have a discussion about energy drinks with Elegg.
A lot of people say that my bangs make me look sulky because they cover my eyes.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Is that what you think, Mr. Commander?
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: A little bit, yeah.
I can't say I've given thought to your bangs.
I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I've kept my hair like this for so long, the thought of combing them back is a bit overwhelming.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Sorry if you're not a fan, but you'll just have to put up with it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Huh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Hmm... how should I put this...
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I guess I feel a little hurt to hear you say that. It's like you're not interested in me at all.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation about hairstyles with Elegg.
I think all of us have people in our lives whom we respect more than others.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: With that in mind,
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: who do you think I respect the most?
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: BOOM Guy.
Trony.
That's right!!
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: BOOM Guy is so freakin' cool.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: He isn't afraid of anything and charges forward without any hesitation. If that isn't worthy of respect, I don't know what is.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I certainly respect Trony,
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: but if I had to pick someone that I respect the most,
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: it's probably BOOM Guy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Throughout the rest of our session, Elegg continues to shower BOOM Guy with effusive praise.
Mr. Commander, did you know that electricity can change color?
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Depending on the temperature and air composition, it can come in different hues.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I didn't know that.
Actually, I did know that.
This principle is actually something we see in our everyday lives, although you'd never guess where:
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: It's neon signs!
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: The reason neon signs have various colors is because they use different combinations of gases.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: No kidding!
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: You know way more about this stuff than I thought you would.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I won't lie, though; it is a little disappointing that I won't have much to teach you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Then... did you know that neon signs operate using these principles?
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Elegg and I enthusiastically discuss how neon signs work.
Do you have any idea what that thing Trony rides is? I can't decide whether it's a chair or a table.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Either way, it looks super comfy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I'm thinking of making something similar. What are some special features I should integrate into the design?
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Whenever you sit down, a small electrical current will run through it.
Have BOOM installed on a display monitor.
Oooh, that'd be nice and tingly!
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: But for safety reasons, I'm not sure I'd be able to ride around with it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: I'll have to leave it in my room.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Well duh,
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: that's a given, Mr. Commander.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: That's hardly what I'd call a special feature.
adviseScripts.speaker: Elegg

adviseScripts.text: Elegg and I enjoy talking to each other during our session.
